offers.descriptionShort: Charming apartment in a good location
offers.information: This apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with garden views. Private parking is available.

offers.descriptionShort: Cozy, comfortable and family friendly in Antwerp
offers.information:
It is a cozy and bright home, fully equipped for holidays.
 The interior is comfortable and practical with comfortable beds and nice details. The living room is furnished with a large sofa (bed) and a comfortable armchair. Also here is a television which can be incorporated as desired TV programs for later viewing.

The Light Studio is located at the second floor of the building and you can check-in yourself with a codelock. The studio is decorated by Stekkie Amsterdam and has a unique colorful style on its own. The studio has everything you need; a boxspring queen size bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a TV with channels from every country in the world, and a bathroom with a rain shower. Super location to explore Antwerp!

Make yourself at home in one of the 3 rooms. Kitchens are equipped with the following equipment: refrigerator and oven. To keep you entertained, the rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs (cable TV), and free wireless internet access will keep you connected. Rooms are cleaned once per stay.
 It features a terrace where you can relax and enjoy the view.

Make yourself at home in one of the 5 individually furnished rooms. Feather comforters and premium linens will make your sleep more comfortable. All rooms have a sofa bed (double). Free wired and wireless internet access is provided. Private bathrooms, showers. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided.

Our apartment is located on the ground floor. It has a modern and cozy appearance and is fully equipped. The bathroom has recently been renewed and has a beautiful, modern concrete-circle look, with underfloor heating. In our apartment you will sleep in peace. We have 2 bedrooms; a front room with a single and a double bed, and a rear room with a double bed.

The studio has everything you need; a queen size boxspring bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a separate bathroom with shower and a lot of storage space. Although the space is relatively small, it gives you a super cosy home-feeling!

The holiday home has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a fridge, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. An iPod docking station keep you entertained, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected.  A terrace is available.

Make yourself at home in one of the 8 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring microwaves and flat-screen televisions. Select Comfort mattresses, down comforters and premium linens will make your sleep more comfortable. Bathrooms feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.
 It features a terrace where you can relax and enjoy the view.

It offers non-smoking rooms, a garden, free high-speed Wi-Fi and a fitness centre. The hotel provides laundry services. Check-in and check-out is done by yourself. Guests can relax on the terrace. The area is popular for cycling. You can rent a bike or car at the hotel.

The apartment feature a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a well-equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator, kettle and coffee machine are included.

It is a cozy and bright home, fully equipped for holidays.
 The interior is comfortable and practical with comfortable beds and nice details. The living room is furnished with a large sofa (bed) and a comfortable armchair. Also here is a television which can be incorporated as desired TV programs for later viewing.

It offers free Wi-Fi and a bar. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. A refrigerator, stovetop, kettle and coffee machine are included.

The apartment has a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, ironing facilities, a desk and a seating area with a sofa. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Enjoy the recreation opportunities such as a fitness center or take in the views from the rooftop terrace and garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and tour/ticket assistance.

The apartment feature a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a well-equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator, kettle and coffee machine are included.

The room is decorated with contemporary and antique furniture.
 The bedroom is nicely furnished and offers a king size bed (box spring) which can be adapted to your sleeping position (can be adapted electrical). Bedding anti allergic. Enough space to hang or lay your clothes in the adjacent dressing cabinet.
 The bathroom is nicely furnished and offers a separate rain shower and toilet, and separate wash sinks.

The apartment has a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, ironing facilities, a desk and a seating area with a sofa. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

We have 3 bedrooms for 5 people. A 6th person can use a comfortable folding bed.
 Living room, kitchen, bathroom and three bedrooms.
 Wifi and TV are available.
 Nearby you can take public transport to the city. You can obtain a line card with us.
 Restaurants and shops are nearby.
 Parking is free near the house.

You will enter the studio with a code and step right into the living and sleeping space which consists out of a boxspring queen size bed, a flatscreen TV with more than 10.000 channels, a chair and coffee table, a wardrobe with an iron and ironing board and a ceiling fan above the bed for the hot summer days and nights! The bathroom consists out of a rain shower, a toilet and a sink with a mirror.

It has a modern and cozy appearance and is fully equipped. The bathroom has recently been renewed and has a beautiful, modern concrete-circle look, with underfloor heating. In our apartment you will sleep in peace. We have 2 bedrooms; a front room with a single and a double bed, and a rear room with a double bed.

Free Wi-Fi is available. The apartments feature a living area with a TV, a seating area and a dining table, an equipped kitchen, and a bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. There is also a furnished terrace at your disposal.

It offers non-smoking rooms, a garden, free high-speed Wi-Fi and a fitness centre. The hotel provides laundry services. Check-in and check-out is done by yourself. Guests can relax on the terrace. The area is popular for cycling. You can rent a bike or car at the hotel.

Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free Wi-Fi at any time. Here you can have a good rest and restore your strength.
 The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage. In addition, as a valued the hotel guest, you can enjoy a lounge that is available on-site. Parking is available for guests arriving by car.
